titles: The VVelchmans life, teath, and periall. Together vvith a long narrow prod list, of the care her tooke in hers life time, to make awle hims frend and acquaintance merry at her teath; abscribing the manner of hers finerall, with fair cost bestowed upon them that comes to hims periall.
publisher: Printed for Thomas Lambert dwelling in Smithfield,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
